basic.description: This course is an introduction to the study modern French Literature by reading and discussing works representative of the various schools and movements. (Spring semester only.)
basic.subject: FRW
basic.title: Survey of French Literature: 19th Century Through the Present

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: FRE 2211; FRE 3420 or FRE 3421, FRW 3100, or instructor permission.
